abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (1) the
            reconstruction to a paved surface of the main road from
            Mbarara of Katunguru, totalling about 70 miles; (2) the
            reconstruction to a gravel surface of three short feeder
            roads totalling about 7 miles; (3) the construction of two
            tea roads totalling about 24 miles; (4) the detailed
            engineering and supervision of construction of the above
            roads; and (5) the detailed engineering of 6 main and 10
            feeder roads totalling approximately 460 miles. All of these
            roads form an integral part of the road program contained in
            the Government's Five Year Development Plan and were
            found by the recent Bank economic mission to be of high priority.
